metadata.name: Default Project Ontology
metadata.description: Base SE ontology with data objects for ODRAS demo

classes.name: Requirement
classes.label: Requirement
classes.comment: A system requirement that specifies what the system shall do

classes.name: Constraint
classes.label: Constraint
classes.comment: A limitation or restriction on requirements

classes.name: Component
classes.label: Component
classes.comment: A physical or logical component of the system

classes.name: Process
classes.label: Process
classes.comment: A sequence of operations or activities

classes.name: CADFile
classes.label: CAD File
classes.comment: Computer-aided design file containing 3D models or technical drawings

object_properties.name: has_constraint
object_properties.label: has constraint
object_properties.comment: Links a requirement to its constraints

object_properties.name: specifies
object_properties.label: specifies
object_properties.comment: Links a requirement to what it specifies

object_properties.name: performs
object_properties.label: performs
object_properties.comment: Links a component to processes it performs

object_properties.name: realizes
object_properties.label: realizes
object_properties.comment: Links a process to functions it realizes

object_properties.name: specifically_depends_upon
object_properties.label: specifically depends upon
object_properties.comment: Links a function back to components it depends on

object_properties.name: has_cad_model
object_properties.label: has CAD model
object_properties.comment: Links a component to its CAD file

datatype_properties.name: file_path
datatype_properties.label: file path
datatype_properties.comment: Path to the CAD file in storage

datatype_properties.name: file_format
datatype_properties.label: file format
datatype_properties.comment: Format of the CAD file (STEP, STL, etc.)

datatype_properties.name: cad_software
datatype_properties.label: CAD software
datatype_properties.comment: Software used to create the CAD file

datatype_properties.name: process_duration
datatype_properties.label: process duration
datatype_properties.comment: Expected duration of the process in minutes
